notes: Modern, recently renovated apartment with clean minimalist design, track lighting, and light wood-tone flooring. The unit appears very clean with modern fixtures including AC and built-in storage. For baby safety, the space has no visible stairs or dangerous balcony access in the photos, but the bedroom shown has a single bed which may be too small for a couple.
